fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Use the abilities of the roles you get.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be given two random Android roles; one for the day and one for the night. Those are your roles, but you win with the Unseen.
- You will not get access to the factional chat, you will also not get access to the factional kill.
- You will not get the following attributes:
> - When you use your ability, a random non-Android will learn five names, at least one of which is an Android.
> - When you use your ability, a random Android's abilities and attributes are revealed to the Town the next day phase.
